channel.title: Comments on: Windows Doesn’t Like Trailing Periods/Dots

item.title: By: Things That Shouldn’t Be in File Names for $1,000 Alex | Joseph Scott's Blog

item.description: [...] Period : After my recent run in with a trailing period I have a special dislike for them. For Windows systems the last period is usually followed by a [...]
